page.title: 10Beamers Youth Club
page.content: The Beamers Youth Club, which meets each Thursday evening was established in October 1983. Catering for the 12-17 year age group (11 year olds attend fortnightly), the club is run by a committee of members with adult leaders participating in a 'steering' capacity. Activities are varied, normal club nights being games nights where members play darts, table-tennis pool, uni-hoc etc. Once a month the Berwickshire Activities Bus visits the club. Special activities have included disco dancing, gliding and sailing. Mr Thornhill of St Agnus End has donated a dinghy which will be used at the Sailing Days on the Whiteadder Reservoir. Archery equipment has recently been purchased.
